titleStmt.title: Description of Center for Advanced Judaic Studies Library, Halper 30: Psalms 135:6-136:17

notesStmt.note: Psalm CXXXVI is presented in the standard, two-column layout; aPsalm CXXXV 6 ובארץ – CXXXVI 17 גדולים כי לעולם חסדו; neither vowels nor cantillation matches standard Masoretic text; also, numerous orthographic variants, mostly plene, many are probably errant. Possibly a fragment from a prayer-book.
Condition: damage in lower exterior corner.

msIdentifier.repository: Center for Advanced Judaic Studies Library

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Hebrew Oriental semi-square vocalization and cantillation (Tiberian)

history.provenance: Cairo Genizah Collection (University of Pennsylvania. Center for Advanced Judaic Studies. Library).
